metadata.name: Execute Code with Pester.bat as Parent
metadata.comment: Detects code execution via Pester.bat (Pester - Powershell Modulte for testing)

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\pwsh.exe'))) AND contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('\\windowspowershell\\modules\\pester\\')) AND (contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('{ invoke-pester -enableexit ;')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('{ get-help "'))))

output.summary: Detects code execution via Pester.bat (Pester - Powershell Modulte for testing)
